org.simplity.kernel.data

Interface DataSheet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FieldsInterface, Iterable<FieldsInterface>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicSheet, MultiRowsSheet, SingleRowSheet

    public interface DataSheet
extends FieldsInterface, Iterable<FieldsInterface>
    A data sheet is a run-time data storage for tabular data - rows of data with each row having values for each of the columns. we expect that the callers of API are responsible to check rows and columns before asking for data, and hence we do not throw exceptions. If caller asks for a non-existing data, it may end-up in a null-pointer exception at run time.
    Author:
    simplity.org

    • Method Detail

      • getRawData

        String[][] getRawData()
        get a simple rows-and-columns data structure with all values as text. boolean is translated to 1/0. date is translated as milliseconds
        Returns:
        array of rows, with the header row containing column names

      • length

        int length()
        Returns:
        number of rows of data. 0 if there is no data.

      • width

        int width()
        Returns:
        number of columns this sheet has

      • getColumnNames

        String[] getColumnNames()
        Returns:
        an array containing the column names, in the order in which raw data (or row data) would be returned.

      • getValueTypes

        ValueType[] getValueTypes()
        Returns:
        value types of columns, in the order in which getColumnNames() would return the column names

      • getRow

        Value[] getRow(int zeroBasedRowNumber)
        Parameters:
        zeroBasedRowNumber - 0 for first row etc..
        Returns:
        one row of data as Value objects.

      • addRow

        void addRow(Value[] row)
        add a row of values
        Parameters:
        row - values in the right order of columns

      • addColumn

        void addColumn(String columnName,
               ValueType columnType,
               Value[] columnValues)
        add a column of values to this sheet. If column is already present, we update its values. This is an expensive operation, as we may have to extend arrays. Use with caution.
        Parameters:
        columnName -
        columnType -
        columnValues - optional. if non-null, its length MUST match the number of rows in the data sheet

      • getAllFields

        Set<Map.Entry<String,Value>> getAllFields(int rowIdx)
        Parameters:
        rowIdx - zero based row in this sheet
        Returns:
        an iterator for accessing all fields as an entry of name-value for current row

      • trace

        void trace()
        trace data in this sheet

      • appendRows

        int appendRows(DataSheet sheet)
        copy rows, if the columns are compatible. Throws application error if value types in the order of columns do not match
        Parameters:
        sheet -
        Returns:
        number of rows copied
